resources.string: Connect the phone to the board to see the weight.
Due to internal problems, your weight information is not getting saved currently.
Connecting ...\nPlease do not stand on the board while this message is shown.
You are already connected to the board.
Please activate the board by pressing the sync button, and then click \"OK\" to continue?
Battery level of the board is very low. Please replace board\'s batteries.\n\n

Could not connect to Bluetooth. Please restart the application. Also note:
1. The board should be blinking while the program is trying to connect. You can make sure on this by pressing and keeping 'sync' button underneath the board.
2. If this problem happens again, turn the Bluetooth off and on again from Settings, Wireless and networks.
